trivia_items.text: Her name refers to the lily of the valley (Convallaria majalis) in Japanese (Kanji: 鈴蘭; Katakana: スズラン). This is referenced by her banner's name which also includes her real name, "Lisa of the Valley".
Suzuran is the only Siracusan Operator who is not native to the country (she was born in Higashi).

Suzuran has the traits of a fox spirit in East Asian mythologies (huli jing or jiuweihu in China, kitsune in Japan, and gumiho in Korea), which can be noticed from her nine tails. A kitsune under a torii is present in Suzuran's Elite 2 artwork.

Suzuran's Lostlands Flowering outfit replaces the blue flame effects of her attacks and skills with sand. This fits the fact that her fox ears resemble those of fennec foxes (Vulpes zerda), which is native to the deserts of North Africa.
sub_items: Some fanarts compare Suzuran with Erwin Rommel, who are nicknamed "the Desert Fox".

trivia_items.text: Suzuran became the butt of jokes and memes during her appearance in TW-4 as she becomes a deliberate victim of Aak's Stimpack skills (which can indeed be abused to remove pre-deployed Operators).
Suzuran's coat of arms on her module is based on the Firefox browser logo.
